title: Suggestions for 'status' typeface
content:
Hi all

I’ve been asked to submit some masthead (magazine logo) ideas for a start-up title called ’Status’, it’s targeted at the ’Exclusive, Rich, Powerful, Sexy and Sophisticated’ or at least that’s the strap line they’ve given me!!

All the sophisticated faces I’ve tried have a bit too much going on (think meta) for a logotype.

So I’m spreading the net, any thoughts of something fresh, beautifully cut, stylish and fashionable? I’m tending towards a sans as the serifs tend to be too fussy but am open minded.

thanks\_\_

 [‹ Help with Egyptian font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015210544/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46210 "Go to previous forum topic") [SuperCooper? Available? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015210544/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46316 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dendicott

comments.content: Oh this kind of thing comes up all the time here. I always suggest the Luxury collection from House Industries.
